description: Convert form post query string to JSON, typecasting values based on JSON Schema

tests.description: If the schema includes all query string keys, the utility returns an object with typecasted values based on the schema.
In the presence of a partial match between schema properties and query string keys, the utility returns an object with matched keys and typecasted values.
When the query string contains keys not defined in the schema, the utility returns an object with only the schema-defined keys and their typecasted values.
